name: Terrostar Technology Solutions
tag_list: web-design, social-media, internet-marketing, app-development, search-engine-optimization, social-media-marketing, seo, pay-per-click
overview:
Terrostar was founded in 1999 by Tom Terronez, our current owner and president. We view our client relationships as an investment in our future. So, it follows that we see your website as a powerful investment in your business’ future. That’s why we spend so much time learning your business, understanding your customer needs, and working diligently to develop a web presence that’s uniquely yours.

Based in the Quad Cities (Iowa/Illinois) but catering to businesses globally, our team is made up of highly creative, talented individuals who share this viewpoint. Together we work to provide our clients with products that look great, work great, and help grow your business. Our core capabilities include:

Custom Website Design
Organic Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
Pay Per Click Placement (PPC)
Email Marketing
Banner Ad Placement
Social Media Marketing
Mobile Web Development
Mobile Phone Applications
Custom Applications
eCommerce
Content Management
Hosting
